config.client.alertIconSize: Adjusts the size of alert icons
config.client.clientAggroIconStyle: Controls the texture used to draw aggro icon
config.client.clientMobBlacklist: Client does not render alert icons above these mobs
config.client.renderAlertIcon: Alert icons will not be displayed if set to false
config.client.renderRange: Only mobs within range will display alert icons
config.client.scaleWithMobSize: Scales alert icons with mob's size
config.client.treatBlacklistAsWhitelist: Client only renders alert icons above these mobs
config.client.xOffset: Adjusts the position of alert icons horizontally
config.client.yOffset: Adjusts the position of alert icons vertically
config.server.clientMobBlacklist: Server does not check target acquisition for these mobs
